title: Personal Site
description: This website. It works on phone too.

title: Password Manager
description: A Python program which saves your passwords and usernames in a SQLite Database and encrypts them using cryptocode library.

title: Pokedex
description: A React project which uses JS, html and scss, that simulates a Pokedex like app. This is my first React project, which sowed me the beauty of this framework.

title: Traffic Simulator
description: Together with a group of 21 people we managed to design a traffic simulator in Java using OOP principles, JavaFX library, threads, algorithms. The project was divided in 5 different modules and I was part of the team which computed the optimum path for cars to get to their destination, using genetic algorithms.

title: Parcel Shiping Simulator
description: My team of 3 members implemented a Web application using HTML, CSS, JS and PHP using only open source libraries (no framework).

title: Scrabble Game
description: Together with a colleague, we managed to desgin the well known Scrabble game, using Java, OOP principles, algorithms and socket programming + JavaFX for the interface.

title: Pheasant
description: A server - client Project which simulates the well known game Pheasant.

title: Mathematical-evaluator
description: A C++ program that evaluates mathematical expressions given as an input string.
